text: Delhi City Lok Sabha constituency was a Lok Sabha (parliamentary) constituency in Delhi from 1951-56. This constituency comprised the entire Kashmere Gate, Kotwali and Hauz Qazi police stations and part of Faiz Bazar police station (excluding the area covered by the erstwhile New Delhi Municipality) of Delhi, which was a Part C state from 1950-56. ==Members of Parliament== {| class="wikitable" |- !colspan="2"|Election!!Member!!Party |- |style="background-color: " | | 1951 | Radha Raman | Indian National Congress |- |style="background-color:" | | 1957 onwards | colspan=2 align=center|Does not exist |- |} ==See also== * Chandni Chowk (Lok Sabha constituency) * Delhi Sadar (Lok Sabha constituency) ==References== Category:Defunct constituencies of the Lok Sabha Category:1951 establishments in India Category:1956 disestablishments in India Category:Constituencies established in 1951 Category:Constituencies disestablished in 1956 Category:Lok Sabha constituencies in Delhi
title: Delhi City (Lok Sabha constituency)
